title: Ae/Pr蓝宝石插件 GenArts Sapphire v8.1.1  (Win64)
author: 大众脸
content:
大名鼎鼎的AE/PR外置 GenArts 蓝宝石插件拥有几百种非常炫的强力视觉效果和转场效果。该插件套装可以提高工作效率，激发创作灵感，提供卓越的图像质量和优秀的渲染速度，深受后期爱好者的喜爱。

新版 GenArts Sapphire v8 重新进行了包装和创新，不仅优化了原有功能，还加入了新效果，如 LightLeak（炫光）、Grunge（纹理）、Shake（抖动）、DigitalDamage（信号故障）和 Crosshatch（线条素描）。效果预览界面更加专业，并支持自定义保存预设。

GenArts Sapphire v8.1.1 进一步提升了性能预览，修复了 FilmRoll 插件的 BUG，并增加了对 Adobe After Effects CC 2015 的支持。
supported_versions: Adobe AE + PR CS6 – CC 2014, CC 2015

download_links.name: Ae/Pr蓝宝石插件 GenArts Sapphire v8.1.1 for Adobe (Win64)

other.plugin_count: 约255个插件，预设效果更多
other.installation_note: 插件为一键安装注册，安装即可使用
known_issues_and_fixes: After updating to this release, S_Effect instances containing Beauty, LightLeak, Grunge, or others may have a color parameter reset.
Fixed a bug in S_Effect that could corrupt AE projects on some machines.
Reduced intensity of some Swish3D presets to speed up renders and avoid Windows GPU driver issues.
Builder: fixed a bug where saved presets sometimes did not show up in the Preset Browser.
Fixed license activation problems on Mac.
VintageColor2Strip: improved results when Red Filter or Bluegreen Filter is set to black.
Fixed a memory leak in Builder.
FlickerMchMatteColor: fixed Set Hold Level button for certain types of match inputs.
GradientMulti now handles pixel aspect ratio correctly.
BleachBypass: Fixed incorrect renders when GrainAmpRed was set to zero.
Caustics: fixed artifacts at the edge of the image when using a custom Bumps pattern
